com.dotcms.publisher.business

Class PublisherAPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dotcms.publisher.business.PublisherAPI
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PublisherAPIImpl

    public abstract class PublisherAPI
extends java.lang.Object
    This class allow to add/update, delete and search error in the publishing_queue table from the actionlets
    Author:
    Oswaldo

      • updateElementStatusFromPublishQueueTable

        public abstract void updateElementStatusFromPublishQueueTable(long id,
                                            java.util.Date last_try,
                                            int num_of_tries,
                                            boolean in_error,
                                            java.lang.String last_results)
                                                       throws DotPublisherException
        update element from publishing_queue table by id
        Parameters:
        id - ID of the element in the publishing_queue
        next_try - date of the next intent to execute the query
        in_error - bolean indication if there was an error
        last_results - error message
        Throws:
        DotPublisherException
